meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Urciuolo Lisa Talley Brian Chan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2939.

td.p: Mark Urciuolo, a sophomore from Marist College
Lisa Talley, a senior from Loyola University (New Orleans)
Brian Chan, a freshman from Harvard University

tr.td: AMERICAN HISTORY
POP QUIZ
HOBBIES
THE BIBLE
ROAD TRIP

Lisa

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
MarkWhat is the Naval Academy [A smiley face was added at the end of his response.]
$3,700
LisaWhat is the Naval Academy?
$3,600
BrianWhat is the [a bit of unreadable scribbling] Naval Academy? D51 [his room number]
$7,000
Naval Academy')
